name: utopia-map-e2e-testing
description: Cypress End-to-End Tests for Utopia Map

scripts.test:split:auto: SPEC_COUNT=$(find e2e -name '*.cy.ts' | wc -l) && echo "Running $SPEC_COUNT chunks in parallel" && for i in $(seq 0 $((SPEC_COUNT-1))); do SPLIT=$SPEC_COUNT SPLIT_INDEX=$i cypress run --e2e --browser chromium & done; wait
scripts.report:generate: marge results/merged-report.json --reportDir results/html --reportTitle 'Utopia Map E2E Tests' --reportPageTitle 'Utopia Map E2E Test Report' --inline --charts
